author: dildick
body: #### PR description: In PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33086, I mistakenly changed plot titles to be only x-axis titles. They should also remain as plot titles. See examples below. I found this after inspecting the comparison plots in the 11_3_0_pre5_phase2 validation campaign. See also https://tinyurl.com/yghes5ry. #### PR validation: Code compiles. #### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR: N/A Before submitting your pull requests, make sure you followed this checklist: - verify that the PR is really intended for the chosen branch - verify that changes follow [CMS Naming, Coding, And Style Rules](http://cms-sw.github.io/cms_coding_rules.html) - verify that the PR passes the basic test procedure suggested in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html) FYI @ptcox
title: Put CSC validation plot titles back in CSCDigiTask
